ygData.msgSnippet: ... She was crying on her knees, looking up at Starscream, with his gun still aimed at her head. I don t know what else I can tell you. she sobbed, What else

::DarkMouse::

She was crying on her knees, looking up at Starscream, with his gun 
still aimed at her head. "I don't know what else I can tell you."  
she sobbed,"What else can I tell you. I don't know anything. I 
thought Inferno was dead along with the others of my old group.  I 
had no idea he was even alive until he just happened to have found me 
in the forest.  He told me that Megatron was dead. At first I didn't 
believe him. But then when I saw on that monitor over there,"points 
with a trembling hand at the console,"that the spark it was working 
on was Megatron's I knew what he said ws true.  Now here you are, 
going to shoot me, and asking me where Megatron is.  If that's his 
spark, then he's right here. I don't know what else I can say."  she 
sobbed and coverred her face with her hands again.
